# rate_gap

## Description
Intermediate datasets used to construct the monthly mortgage rate gap and
the shift-share (Bartik) instrumental variable for Chapter 2, including:
- HMDA-based monthly outstanding mortgage rates (CBSA-by-month)
- monthly PMMS 30-year fixed-rate mortgage (FRM) series
- the merged CBSA-by-month mortgage rate gap panel
- shift-share IV components combining local exposure and national shocks

## Generated by
- **HMDA monthly outstanding rate:**  
  `code/ch02/02_rate_gap/01_outstanding_rate_monthly.R`
- **PMMS merge + rate gap + national plot:**  
  `code/ch02/02_rate_gap/02_rate_gap_monthly.R`
- **Shift-share IV construction (NatShock × Exposure):**  
  `code/ch02/02_rate_gap/03_build_shiftshare_iv.R`

## Output files 
- `msa_outstanding_rate_monthly.csv`  
  CBSA-by-month outstanding-weighted mortgage rates constructed from HMDA 30Y loans
- `pmms_30y_monthly.csv`  
  Monthly average PMMS 30-year fixed-rate mortgage series
- `rate_gap_monthly.csv`  
  CBSA-by-month mortgage rate gap (`pmms_30y - weighted_rate`)
- `SS_IV.csv`  
  Shift-share (Bartik) IV panel containing:
  - `Exposure` (CBSA-level exposure index constructed from HMDA rate-bin shares)
  - `NatShock_level` (national shock: residual from regressing PMMS on GS10)
  - `Z_bartik_level = Exposure × NatShock_level`
  - `Z_bartik_cum` (cumulative-shock variant, optional)

## Time coverage
- **2018–2024 (monthly)**

## Notes
- The Instrument variable (SS_IV) related explanation also been showed with details in a separate files (**data/transformed/ch02/iv/README.md**)
